Description:
A Glamorous Home Base.
This brand new street frontage three bedroom townhouse featuring an edgy modern façade and bold intelligent interiors makes a glamorous home base. Zoned to Strathmore Secondary College, near buses, Melville Road trams, parks, local shopping, Sydney Road and CityLink, this sophisticated home presents a lifestyle of enviable convenience set amid luxe interiors. Impressive in its sense of space with plenty of natural light throughout, it showcases an indoor/outdoor living domain of exceptional style where Tasmanian Oak floors, an eye-catching floating staircase, dramatic black Smeg/Caesarstone appointed kitchen and Merbau deck and gardens combine to deliver on-trend living. Private bedrooms share two fully tiled bathrooms featuring statement tapware and fixtures while heating/cooling, an alarm, ducted vacuum and garage with remote and internal access will have you in seventh heaven.
Insights: 70A Bruce Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Limitless Potential
Tucked away in a convenient location this potential packed home is waiting for you to write its next chapter. An ideal family home perfect to live in now or create the home of your dreams. Built upon 420m2 with a North facing backyard there is ample space to enjoy the great outdoors. Whether you're buying to live or looking to invest for the future it's hard to pass up this opportunity.
Featuring two large bedrooms with the master having a built in robe and warm carpet under foot. A central bathroom compliments the home with large shower and storage via the vanity unit. Currently set up with two large living zones there is scope to create an extra bedroom or perhaps reconfigure the home to create a true entertainer. The kitchen offers gas cooking, spacious bench tops and plenty of cupboard space which flows onto the dining area and then out to the backyard.
A first class location is the backbone of any real estate move and this home has it in spades. Walking distance to the train via Batman station and the tram on Sydney road. An abundance of restaurants, cafes and specialty shops are all close by not to mention the Coburg North Village and Lincoln Mills Homemaker Centre for all your needs. If you find you need to get out and stretch your legs there's the Upfield Bike path and Coburg Lake Reserve almost on you door step. This home offers everything needed to enjoy for years to come.
Insights: 4 Armstrong Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
The Ultimate Family Home.
Immaculately presented residence bathed in natural light offering rooms of Grand proportions will impress the growing family. Offering an abundance of accommodation and nestled in the ever popular Pentridge Village Estate!
A versatile free flowing floor plan offers a relaxed and comfortable environment including an enormous open plan living/family dining area with feature timber sliders overlooking the entertainer's rear yard. A state of the art kitchen will impress any chef with an extra wide stone benchtop, smoked mirrored splash back and walk in pantry. A double fan forced oven, 900mm gas cook top and built in coffee machine complete the package!
The formal living room doubles as a grand cinema room and the large study or guest bedroom on the ground floor features timber windows and plantation shutters.
First Floor
The luxurious master suite is truly grand with an added living zone, huge ensuite with double shower, twin vanities and walk in robes.
A further three large bedrooms all with built in robes and the main central bathroom features a large bathtub and separate shower. A family retreat or kids area makes completes the zone.
Added Attractions: Solid timber stair case -quality timber floor boards- central zoned heating and refrigerated cooling- alarm and video intercom system- gas boosted solar hot water service and solar power- huge laundry with external access-loads of storage and front drive way to double lock up garage.
With too many extras to list to truly appreciate this home it must be inspected!
Insights: 7 Lynn Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Masterclass In Contemporary Style
Boasting high-end finishes and a sense of luxury at every turn, this brand new four bedroom three bathroom home is a masterclass in contemporary style. Spotted Gum flooring, black window frames and a striking kitchen featuring 900mm Smeg appliances, glossy glass splashbacks and white stone counters create a living domain of exceptional class. Opening to an entertainer's deck it sets the standard in low-maintenance family living. Bedrooms are well zoned and the fully tiled bathrooms luxurious, featuring oversized showers, floating vanities and elegant freestanding tub. Excellence continues through heating/cooling, double glazing, alarm, ducted vacuum and garage with remote and internal access. Zoned to Strathmore Secondary College it enjoys buses, Melville Road trams, parks, local shopping, Sydney Road and CityLink nearby.

Description:
Moore, Moore, Moore
Spacious, flexible design defines this three bedroom home with its allotment of approximately 522m2 opening up all kinds of alluring possibilities (subject to council approval). Update, extend, build new or develop (subject to relevant approvals) with wide street frontage and a beautifully connected position to appreciate. Presently providing living and dining areas, a kitchen/meals with gas cooking, large family room with wood heater and big bright bedrooms, plus a covered outdoor entertaining area and gardens, the layout is undeniably generous. Polished floorboards make smart impressions and there's also air conditioning, plus a centrally positioned bathroom, roller shutters, side driveway, storage shed and carport, protected by automatic roller door. Stroll to three tram lines, trains, schools, playgrounds and buzzing Sydney Road.
Insights: 56 Moore Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless Elegance with Flair and Flexibility
Exceptionally spacious, beautifully appointed and bathed in natural light, this extended Californian Bungalow delivers an environment that's tailor-made for growing families - all in a wonderfully quality and convenient Coburg neighbourhood. High ornate ceilings throughout, the home's free-flowing interior boasts four main bedrooms (two on each level) all with built-in robes, two period-inspired bathrooms (one with spa) and guest powder room (third WC). Formal and informal living zones include an elegant central lounge and dining, large upstairs rumpus (optional fifth bedroom) and expansive open-plan family/meals area accompanied by a granite-bench kitchen with solid timber cabinetry and stainless steel appliances. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling add to the appeal, along with an alarm system, Forest Red Gum solid timber floors, lead-light windows, family-sized laundry, huge under-stair storeroom and additional attic storage space. French doors reveal a Jarrah-decked undercover entertaining area, sizeable backyard with high fences all-round for outstanding privacy, plus two rear parking spaces (r/c rollerdoor to ROW) and additional two-car front off-street parking. Close to a range of attractions including Coburg West and St Fidelis primary schools, public transport options, Sydney Road eateries and vibrant shopping precinct, as well as easy access to Citylink/Tullamarine Freeway. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 54 Queen Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 12 other 5 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
IDEALLY LOCATED IN COBURG'S PREMIER STREET
Opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers or investors to secure a fabulous property in this tree-lined street on the city edge.
Short stroll from the lifestyle advantages of wetlands, bike and walking tracks along the Merri Creek.
- Renovated kitchen with gas hotplate/dishwasher
- Light filled open plan kitchen and meals room
- 2 generous sized bedrooms with BIR
- Separate bathroom and laundry
- Entertainers courtyard
- Lockup garage with remote, split system and gas fireplace
Ideally situated within walking distance to tram/bus, parks, excellent local schools and the Coburg shopping precinct.

Description:
Renovators Paradise
Perfectly positioned in the prestigious Glencairn Estate, within a picturesque tree-lined street this has opportunity written all over it. This commanding Californian Bungalow home is ripe for renovating, offering a spacious floorplan including three generous sized bedrooms, a combined kitchen/meals zone, separate lounge and a central bathroom. Outside, a great sized backyard, garage, a single carport, an additional 3+ off street car spaces, and a series of outhouses which can be restored and potentially converted into a bungalow or extended as part of the home (STCA). Not to mention we are situated approximately 9km's north of the CBD, within close proximity to many local schools, parklands including Mailer & Anderson Reserve, Sydney Road shopping strip, CityLink access at Moreland Road and local bus, train and tram options.
Let your imagination run wild, this timeless classic is ready to welcome your ideas!
Insights: 9 Wattle Grove, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Style, Size & Setting: Stunning from Every Aspect
Attuned entirely to contemporary comfort; stunning natural light, style and seclusion signify a bold, brilliant approach to the apartment concept. Graceful full-length terrace showcases an aptitude for entertaining in combination with its airy interiors.
- Sensationally positioned literally steps from Coburg Station
- Fresh air and light circulate openly across living spaces
- Quality SMEG and stone enrich stylish kitchen design
- Fitted robes to each bedroom, main opening to terrace
- Bathroom showcases relaxing step-in rain shower
- Double glazing provides the desired level of serenity
- Secure instant entry from quiet side laneway
- Off-street car space, cage and communal bike storage
- Walk to Sydney Rd's collection of shops and cafés
- Trams, buses and Coburg Leisure Centre are moments away
Insights: G08/146 Bell Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Choice Chandos Corner
Sitting pretty on a corner with a rear right of way, resulting in only one immediate neighbour, this impeccably kept four bedroom home on approximately 422m2 of land anticipates great things. Presenting a living room, adjoining dining room and vast kitchen/meals area with plenty of natural light, highlighting a 900mm gas stove and matching rangehood, the elevated residence is immediately comfortable. Complete with built-in robes in all bedrooms, a central bathroom with shower, separate bath, toilet and bidet, plus a powder room, it's full of potential. Heating, cooling, polished floorboards, electric shutters and an automatic double garage, accessing excellent storage, are further stand out features. Consider the possibilities and make your mark here (subject to council approval). A stroll to trains, trams, parks, cafes and vibrant Coburg Market.
Insights: 32 Chandos Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Light, Bright and Secure
Steps to Batman Station and Upfield bike path, this one bedroom apartment is as enticing as it is young. Oversized north facing windows fill the large living area with natural light. The home is well serviced by a large bathroom plus a smart kitchen boasting dishwasher and soft-close drawers. Other features include split system air conditioning, European laundry, secure parking, storage cage, video intercom, BIRs and large north facing balcony. Convenience, modern style and easy lifestyle assure investor, downsizer and starter appeal.

Description:
LOOK GOOD, BUY SMART
This solid brick 1930 art deco family home is sure to impress once inside with its renovated interior and grand room proportions.
Comps; entry with timber flooring. 2 very large bedrooms with b.i.r's, super sized lounge room, and adjoining formal dining area, (ceramic heater, ofp) via it's double glass doors.
Renovated enormous gas equipped kitchen with dishwasher, fully tiled and lovely period stain glass windows, central tiled bathroom with separate shower and bathtub.
Rear court sized undercover area for enjoying an outdoor meal, 2 parking spaces.
Features; art deco period features of ceilings, windows, ofp/heater, air cond, ducted heating, ducted vacuum system, alarm system. Manageable front garden.
Bonus for the investor is the corner hairdressing salon. Currently return approx $12,500 p/a on a secure lease. Could eventually be re opened up to the home to add more accommodation.
Great home located in this popular suburb with all transport, shopping and schools close at hand. Seriously smart buying.
Insights: 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Pretty Home with Period Flare!
This precious gem is ready to be brought back to its best with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & a whole lot of potential!
Featuring extra-high ceilings, ornate ceiling roses & picture rails - current floor plan includes; 3 bedrooms with robes, separate living room or potential for 4th bedroom with split system . Large dining room flowing through to kitchen. 2 bathrooms, sep laundry. Low maintenance backyard with undercover entertaining area & large, garden shed. ROW at side of block for car space.
800m (approx.) to Batman station, bus at end of your street & Harmony Park in the next block. Short walk to Coburg North Primary, Coburg North Shopping Precinct & only about 10km to CBD.
With art deco highlights & hardwood floors, make this home shine!

Description:
Price Reduction - Live in or Invest!
Stunningly spacious this tri level villa has all the luxury you expect in Melbourne's inner suburb of Coburg. This town home design offers spacious ground floor entry with generous entrance, separate study/3rd bedroom and safe internal access from the private car accommodation. On the first floor you will find a well-appointed low maintenance kitchen with stone bench top, stainless steel appliances - gas cook top, under bench oven & stainless steel dishwasher. Lovely textured floor boards grace the living area and is complimented by a generous under cover balcony which will compliment all year round entertainment. Level three offers two generous bedrooms, both with BIR's and a modern central bathroom. Just step into your new home and you are living the best Coburg has to offer! Or invest and laugh all the way to the bank with this perfect cash cow. Enjoy the local parks & paths, library and convenience shopping and services.
Don't miss this opportunity. Inspection is a must!
PRIVATE SALE
FOR FURTHER INFORMATION PLEASE CONTACT:
CARLA PRIMIANO 0407 183 331 OR ZORAN MILENKOVIC 0417 586 657

Description:
Period Presence Reimagined for Perfect Modern Living
Wow! Beyond the grand facade of this Federation showpiece, discover a spacious and versatile interior with stunning renovations throughout delivering a luxurious family-focused lifestyle in Coburg's exclusive Moreland Park vicinity. Towering ceilings throughout adorned with ornate plasterwork, the home's elegant interior showcases a wide central hallway, four bedrooms (three extra-large) and sumptuous main bathroom complete with marble-mosaic feature wall, frameless shower and freestanding bath. The light-filled open living/dining area is complemented by a gourmet kitchen featuring stone benchtops and splashbacks, soft-close cabinetry, ample cupboard space, Smeg oven and Fisher & Paykel double dish drawers. Other highlights include ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, open fireplaces and solid timber floors, modern laundry/second bathroom, plus a large al-fresco entertaining deck and deep north-facing backyard, as well as a gorgeous picket-fenced front garden and gated side driveway to garage/workshop. A brilliant location in cosmopolitan Coburg with Sydney Road trams at the end of the street, it's also walking distance to cafes and restaurants, boutique shops and major supermarkets, local schools and Moreland Station. Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 3 Rennie Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Own a piece of history
A truly unique home that keeps on giving. Located in the iconic Pentridge estate, from the moment you walk through the front door, you realise you have found what you are looking for. With a clever use of space, such as a laundry under the stairs, and an amazing outdoor entertaining area this home is sure to impress. Suiting everyone from all walks of life - whether you're looking for your first home, a desirable downsize or secure investment; this opportunity won't last.
Boasting a generously sized bedroom with sought after features such as exposed brick and timber beams, you will experience a sense of style not often seen in the area. A central bathroom separates the superb study area, perfect for those looking for more than just the standard one bedroom apartment. With an open plan living and dining area, entertaining will be a breeze as you sprawl out onto the deck for a BBQ or quality time with family and friends. A kitchen that will satisfy any household master chef, is fully equipped with stainless steel splash back and gas cooking.
Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Sydney Road, you will find an abundance of local cafes, restaurants and shops. Or get your caffeine fix at the Boot Factory Café. With excellent transport options such as the 19 tram and the Upfield train line, you can leave the car at home. Local parks include Brosnan Community Park and Coburg Lake Reserve, allowing you to enjoy all that this exclusive location has to offer.
Insights: 11/1 Industry Lane, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Promise and Potential In A Premier Pocket
Set in the serenity of a friendly neighbourhood, this three bedroom Art Deco home on a deep 438m2 (approx.) allotment, presents families and renovators an outstanding opportunity to create the home of their dreams in one of Coburg's premier pockets. A true lifestyle locale with an emphasis on family living, this home boasts a location surrounded by quality schools including Coburg North Primary and its Farmer's Market, O'Heas Bakery, buses, Melville Road trams, Coburg North Shopping Village, parks and the cosmopolitan bustle of Sydney Road ensuring a vibrant lifestyle of the utmost convenience. Take this home to the next level with a stunning renovation that will update and showcase the lofty ceilings and generous proportions of this home, currently comprising lounge with original fireplace and picture rails, serviceable kitchen with meals, spacious bedrooms, neat bathroom and generous rear gardens; or start afresh and create a state-of-the-art contemporary residence tailored to your needs, STCA.
Immediately comfortable with heating/cooling, single garage and ample off-street parking, its promise, potential and enviable location make this one not to miss.
Insights: 9 Francis Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home, Invest Or Downsize
A unit that gives you not only the perfect location but the convenience for those with a busy lifestyle as well. This 2 bedroom unit has been freshly painted throughout and is perfect for those looking to buy their first home, looking to downsize or simply looking to invest. Upon entering the unit you are greeted by a good sized lounge area filled with natural light that leads through to a separate kitchen and meals area that has been refurbished. This unit is neatly positioned towards the rear of the block, it's one of only six and features a private, sunny courtyard with minimal maintenance requirements, front veranda and undercover carport. Within a few minutes walk to Anderson Reserve to kick the footy or a simple stroll to Sydney Road to jump on a tram you will find this location is perfect for those with a busy lifestyle and looking for affordable living.
Insights: 5/69 Marks Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Roll Up Your Sleeves and Reap the Rewards
Set on a substantial block of land with quick and easy access to the best of Coburg, this quintessential Californian Bungalow provides all the necessary ingredients for a stunning renovation and significant extension (STCA). Ready to rejuvenate, the home's current floorplan comprises two genuinely large bedrooms and central bathroom, along with a front lounge leading through to the kitchen/dining area. Step outside to discover a surprisingly deep backyard complete with garage via side driveway and ROW at the rear - all highlighting the property's generous dimensions and untapped future potential. A prime location walking distance to Nicholson Street trams, Merri Creek trails and acres of parkland, it's also close to primary and secondary schools as well as Sydney Road's renowned cafes and restaurants, shops, supermarkets and Coburg Station.
Land: 13.29 x 36.57=486sqm Approx
Insights: 118 Harding Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Captivating Stunning Home.
Beautifully presented throughout with an eye for meticulous detail, this new home has been built to a high standard. Enjoying 3 bedrooms, plus study (or 4th bedroom), a shining main bathroom, ensuite, powder room and formal lounge. Highlighting soaring ceilings, it features a huge family room, dining and kitchen with a walk-in pantry and Falcon Classic stove. Other features include zoned heating and refrigerated cooling, video intercom, attic storage, electric gates for off street parking. An entertainer's deck overlooks a grassy backyard area with pizza oven. Zoned to Strathmore College and walk to local Primary School. An ideal family home.
Insights: 122 Gordon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Convenience
Moments to Batman station and Upfield Bike Path, this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment is modern and convenient. Oversized East facing windows fill the spacious living area soaked with natural light, sliding glass doors out to your own private balcony. The property is well serviced by modern main and ensuite bathroom plus a smart kitchen boasting glass splashbacks, stone counters and modern appliances. Other features include split system air conditioning, European style laundry, secure carport, storage cage, video intercom and BIRs. Convenience, modern style and easy lifestyle assure investor, downsizer and starter appeal. Inspections are a must.
Insights: 208/53 Gaffney Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2019 and 73 other 2 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.
